entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump Talk about fiddling while Rome burns. The US has the most cases of Coronavirus of any wealthy nation in the world. How about you do something about that instead of tweeting about this bullshit. Oh, wait, misdirection, I get it... #TrumpKillsUS #TrumpRecession #TrumpOwnsEveryDeath
